name: Arduilamp
tagline: Arduino serial controlled RGB lamp + Desktop client
body:
### Arduino serial controlled RGB lamp + Desktop client.
This is a simple Arduino RGB lamp controlled using serial port. The python desktop client uses the serial port to control the RGB lamp color.

### Arduino sketch
![arduilamp_sketch](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/imartinez/arduilamp/master/arduilamp-doc/sketch.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
